hero.heroText: Take the First Step Toward Your Health and Happiness

introduce.introduceText: As a professional Reiki Master, I help to find balance and inner strength, leading people on the path of self-discovery through healing and support.

services.servicesText: These are the different ways I can support your wellness journey:

servicesCard1.title: Individual Session
servicesCard1.text: Reiki is a profound energy healing practice where I, as a practitioner, assist clients in accessing their inner peace and balance. Through gentle touch and energy transfer, I guide individuals to release blockages, promote healing, and enhance their well-being.

servicesCard2.title: Group Sessions
servicesCard2.text: Reiki is a unique method of energy healing rooted in ancient Japanese traditions. In group sessions, I, as a Reiki practitioner, help clients restore their energy and harmony through touch, meditation, and alignment with positive vibrations.

servicesCard3.title: Reiki Meditation
servicesCard3.text: Reiki meditation provides a unique opportunity to explore energy healing within. As a certified guide, I lead individuals through meditative practices rooted in Reiki principles, helping them tap into healing energy for self-awareness, balance, and relaxation.

servicesCard4.title: Reiki Training
servicesCard4.text: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques. As a certified instructor, I guide students through the principles of Reiki, enabling them to harness healing energy for themselves and others. This journey promotes personal growth.

certification.title: Qualification and Сertification
certification.text: I proudly share my Reiki Master certificate, along with achievements from other training events. May this inspire you to begin your own journey of growth and healing through Reiki.

cards.certificationCard1: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques.
cards.certificationCard2: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques.
cards.certificationCard3: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques.
cards.certificationCard4: Reiki training offers a unique opportunity to learn energy healing techniques.

steps.title: How does Reiki Practice Works
steps.text: Reiki is an energy healing practice that promotes relaxation, balance, and healing by channeling life force energy.

step1.title: Book an appointment
step1.text: This step will help you make yourself known and receive valuable feedback.

step2.title: Receive your tailored consultation
step2.text: This step provides you with personalized insights and expert guidance to address your unique needs and goals.

step3.title: Ongoing and circular care
step3.text: Experience continuous, interconnected support designed to nurture and sustain your well-being over time.

step4.title: Begin your treatment and program
step4.text: Take the first step toward achieving your goals with a personalized plan designed just for you.

accordion.question: What is Reiki, and how does it work?
accordion.answer: Reiki is a gentle energy healing practice that promotes relaxation and balance by channeling universal life energy through the hands of a practitioner.

accordion.question: What’s the difference between Reiki and traditional medicine?
accordion.answer: Reiki is a holistic, complementary therapy that supports overall well-being, while traditional medicine focuses on diagnosing and treating specific medical conditions.

accordion.question: How do I know if Reiki is right for me?
accordion.answer: If you're looking for relaxation, stress relief, or energetic balance, Reiki may be beneficial. You’re welcome to try a session and see how it feels for you.

accordion.question: Is Reiki only for people with health issues?
accordion.answer: No, Reiki is for anyone seeking relaxation, emotional balance, or personal growth, regardless of health status.

accordion.question: Do you offer a free initial consultation?
accordion.answer: Yes, I offer a brief initial consultation to discuss your needs and answer any questions.

accordion.question: How long does a typical Reiki session last?
accordion.answer: A standard session lasts between 45 to 60 minutes.

accordion.question: How private and confidential is a Reiki session?
accordion.answer: Reiki sessions are completely private and confidential, ensuring a safe and comfortable experience.

accordion.question: Is there a specific location for in-person Reiki sessions?
accordion.answer: Yes, in-person sessions are available at the Athlone studio.

accordion.question: Do you offer Reiki sessions in-person, online, or both?
accordion.answer: I offer both in-person and online Reiki sessions to accommodate different preferences.

registration.title: Register for the Session
registration.text: Let’s Get Started! Claim Your 30-Minute Free Consultation Today:

story.title: My Story
story.secondTitle: How I Found My Calling Through Reiki
story.text: My journey into the world of Reiki began as a search for a deeper meaning in life. I always felt that my purpose was to help people, but it was only when I discovered this ancient Japanese practice that everything fell into place. Reiki became more than just a practice for me — it became a path to healing, harmony, and inner awakening. I immersed myself in studying this art, delving deep into its wisdom, and soon realized that this was what I wanted to share with the world. Every session I conducted felt like a new story — a story of transformation, renewal, and inspiration. People came to me in search of peace, balance, and strength, and I witnessed how their eyes filled with light after our sessions. It was truly magical.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.text: Today, I am not just a Reiki Master — I am a guide to harmony and inner balance. My goal is to help you find your own path to peace and strength while teaching you how to use this knowledge in your life. I create a space where you can feel safe, where every emotion is accepted, and every need is heard. My sessions are more than just energy work — they are a journey to your true self.

missionList.item1: Creating a safe, compassionate space for healing.
missionList.item2: Helping people find balance and harmony in their lives.
missionList.item3: Teaching Reiki to those who seek personal growth.

choose.title: Why Choose Me?
choose.text: My clients say that after working with me, they feel renewed, filled with energy, and ready for new achievements. My students call me a "light guide" who has helped them find their inner strength and confidence.

chooseList.item1: Experience and Results – Over the years, I have helped hundreds of people find harmony and healing.
chooseList.item2: Personalized Approach – Every person is unique, and I tailor my methods to your specific needs.
chooseList.item3: Deep Commitment – Reiki is not just my profession; it is my life. I live by this energy and happily share it with you.

joinMe.title: Join Me!
joinMe.text: Are you ready to change your life? To feel harmony? To learn how to manage your energy? I invite you to a Reiki session or to learn this beautiful art! Together, we will open a new world of possibilities for your body, mind, and soul.
joinMe.secondText: Get in touch, and let’s begin your journey to harmony and inner strength!

block1.title: Individual Reiki Session
block1.text: Individual Reiki sessions help deeply relax, restore energetic balance, and support physical and emotional well-being. During a session, the Reiki practitioner places their hands on specific areas of the body or works within the client's energy field, promoting the harmonization of life energy.

expect.title: What to Expect:
expect.text2: A sensation of warmth or tingling during the session.
expect.text3: Overall improvement in well-being and emotional state.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.text1: Reduction of stress and anxiety levels.
benefits.text2: Improved energetic balance of the body.
benefits.text3: Support for physical health and pain relief.

whoItsFor.title: Who It’s For:
whoItsFor.text1: People looking for a way to relax and relieve tension.
whoItsFor.text2: Those going through a challenging period in life and in need of emotional support.
whoItsFor.text3: Individuals interested in energy practices and self-development.

block2.title: Group Reiki Session
block2.text: Group Reiki sessions take place in a shared atmosphere where participants interact with each other and receive energetic support from the practitioner. These gatherings may include meditations, tuning into positive energy, and collective healing.

expect.title: What to Expect:
expect.text1: Shared practice in a friendly environment.
expect.text2: A sense of harmony and unity with the group.
expect.text3: Improved emotional state and infusion of positive energy.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.text1: Enhanced energetic effect through group interaction.

whoItsFor.title: Who It’s For:
whoItsFor.text1: People who feel the need for support from like-minded individuals.
whoItsFor.text2: Those who want to combine Reiki with meditation in a group setting.
whoItsFor.text3: Individuals looking for new ways to relieve stress and achieve inner harmony.

block3.title: Reiki Meditation
block3.text: Reiki meditations help cleanse energy channels, restore inner peace, and enhance vitality. The practice includes special breathing techniques, visualization, and concentration on energy flows.

expect.title: What to Expect:
expect.text1: Deep relaxation and release of emotional tension.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.text2: Strengthens the connection with one’s body and intuition.
benefits.text3: Aids in unlocking inner potential and raising awareness levels.

whoItsFor.title: Who It’s For:
whoItsFor.text1: People who want to learn how to manage their own energy.
whoItsFor.text2: Those seeking to improve concentration and inner harmony.
whoItsFor.text3: Individuals looking for an effective meditation method for daily life.

block4.title: Reiki Training
block4.text: Reiki training is a journey of self-discovery, the development of energetic abilities, and an opportunity to help oneself and others. The course consists of theoretical and practical lessons, during which students receive initiation into the corresponding Reiki level.

expect.title: What to Expect:
expect.text1: Learning the fundamental principles of Reiki and energy practices.
expect.text2: Mastering techniques for self-healing and working with others' energy.
expect.text3: Gradual deepening of the connection with universal life energy.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.text1: The ability to practice Reiki independently in daily life.
benefits.text2: Development of sensitivity to energy flows.
benefits.text3: Gaining skills that contribute to harmony and life improvement.

whoItsFor.title: Who It’s For:
whoItsFor.text1: People who want to develop their own energetic abilities.
whoItsFor.text2: Those looking to help themselves and their loved ones through Reiki.
whoItsFor.text3: Individuals seeking new methods of personal and spiritual growth.

durationAndFormat.title: Duration & Format:
durationAndFormat.text1: Duration: Depends on the level (from 1 day to several weeks).
